name: Galaga™
description:
Classic arcade shoot ‘em up Galaga was faithfully recreated for the home in this acclaimed NES™ version.

Galaga became an instant classic with its innovative fighter combination system and varied enemy attack patterns. Control your fighter and shoot down the waves of invading aliens; and win bonuses in challenging stages by not missing a single enemy.

If your fighter gets captured by an enemy, free it from the tractor beam and combine with it to form a dual fighter with twice the firepower!
